name: Redux 6/6- Study after Velázquez's Portrait of Pope Innocent X
description:
Redux Series Drop 1 Pt.6/6 - Recreation of the painting "Study after Velázquez's Portrait of Pope Innocent X" by the artist Francis Bacon.

This is part 6/6 of an exercise which ended up turning into something greater. The idea behind this was to recreate traditional paintings I'm really fond as a way of studying the greats since I've never had any "formal" training in the arts. As "rules" for this exercise, I established that I must use my own style and color palette without losing the essence of the original piece.
All pieces in this series are highly textured 3000x3000px PNGs created in only four colors (cyan, magenta, yellow and black), with all tone variations done only using black halftones to maintain the stipulated 4 colors.
